I ate a bagel.
A delicious bagel
Coded a couple of things, but they were all glitchy.

This is a longer entry, which is intended largely as a way of breaking the codepen does not let me use this word, but if the word I cannot use does not break then this thing is just stoooooopid. This is a responsive timeline, and it has the word responsive in it, so it must be cool! Yay for buzzwords!
